title: Today's Brief - February 25, 2026
description: The Pentagon gives Anthropic until Friday to provide unrestricted military AI access or face severe penalties, while Novo Nordisk slashes Ozempic and Wegovy prices by up to 50% starting in 2027. Plus Nvidia's make-or-break earnings after the bell could determine whether AI stocks continue their recent rebound or face another selloff.

title: Today's Brief - February 24, 2026
description: A viral AI thought experiment triggers massive tech selloffs as investors panic over a dystopian 2028 scenario where AI agents collapse the financial system, while Meta strikes a $100+ billion deal with AMD to fuel its AI expansion. From software stocks plummeting on automation fears to mortgage rates finally dropping below 6% for the first time since 2022, today's episode unpacks the market chaos reshaping everything from Wall Street to Main Street.

title: Today's Brief - February 23, 2026
description: Wall Street embraces the "HALO" trade as investors flock to AI-resistant stocks like McDonald's and John Deere, while all eyes turn to Nvidia's make-or-break earnings Wednesday that could reshape the $65.7 billion revenue chipmaker's future. Plus, global markets tumble as the US imposes sweeping 15% tariffs following a Supreme Court ruling, sending gold soaring amid renewed trade war fears.

title: Today's Brief - February 22, 2026
description: OpenAI slashes its ambitious spending target from $1.4 trillion to $600 billion by 2030 while cybersecurity stocks crash 8-9% in a "mini-flash crash" after Anthropic unveils AI that can automatically patch code vulnerabilities. Plus, the Supreme Court strikes down global tariffs as AI continues reshaping entire industries from gaming to autonomous vehicles.
